Title: Planner (Junior Level, Aviation, Shift Work, Changi)
JobDescription: We are seeking a junior planner to support schedule planning, spare parts logistics, and shift-based operations at Changi Airport. The ideal candidate has familiarity with scheduling, inventory tracking systems, and basic knowledge of aircraft operations, maintenance scheduling, or MRO processes.
JobRequirement: Candidate should be able to coordinate with suppliers and maintenance staff, manage shift rosters, and maintain accurate documentation of spares and work progress.
